channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole on pot hole in a pot hole, 2nd May
item.description:
Just look for the patch of crap repair you've done 5 or 6 times before and you'll see it, that hole, that one, you know you can see it. I look forward to your "inspector" reporting there is no issue found as they always do, because they are useless like the morons who "fix" the roads! Fix pothole properly!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 402, Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot Hole is road that was not fixed properly, 2nd May
item.description:
Again this pothole appears just before the end of the road, why does it keep coming back? Is it because you don't fix it properly? Why yes that is the reason, even a cat can fill a hole in, but not you lazy morons who "fix" the roads. Fix the hole properly so you don't have to keep coming back unless this is scam to get more money from the tax payers? Hmmmm I wonder.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Elm Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely dangerous junction, 2nd May
item.description:
Exiting Elbridge Court onto the large roundabout is exceedingly dangerous if trying to access the A40 to Cheltenham. Traffic light timings allow traffic to build uo on the roundabout and make it nearly impossible to safely get in the correct lane for the A40 east. This is made worse by drivers on the roundabout treating it like a
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 2nd May

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 2nd May
item.description:
NWD with give and take please bring x 4 2m barriers and x8 sandbags plus x 2 footway closure boards and place around damaged footway (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 2nd May
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED PLEASE MAKE SAFE WITH TEMPORARY TARMAC OVER COVER AS BARRIERS WHICH ARE NEXT TO NUMBER 368 KEEP GETTING MOVED AN DAMAGED A SECTION 81 HAS BEEN RAISED FOR THIS TO BE REPAIRED (Damaged Street Furniture)
